Title: The Hungry
Writer: Bornila Chatterjee (screenplay), Tanaji Dasgupta (screenplay), Kurban Kassam (screenplay), Ashish Verma (hindi dialogue)
Actors: Naseeruddin Shah, Tisca Chopra, Antonio Aakeel, Neeraj Kabi
Plot: An adaptation of William Shakespeare's Titus Andronicus set in contemporary New Delhi. The Hungry is a contemporary retelling of Shakespearian tragedy Titus Andronicus, set in the ...
